## Functions

### createDedicatedExit() {#a087b8382e9e76fa52c0c473b14f7d37d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MachineBasicBlock &#42; createDedicatedExit (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Loop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Exit)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a dedicated exit for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.

Exit is the original exit for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>. If it is already dedicated exit, return it. Otherwise, insert a new block between them and return the new block.

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the register values for  the operands of a Phi instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function assume the instruction is a Phi.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40" lineLink="#ad4cf8c8e4e2cc5bf94656e979ed629b4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#ad4cf8c8e4e2cc5bf94656e979ed629b4">getPhiRegs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Phi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;InitVal, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;LoopVal) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Phi.isPHI() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting a Phi.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">  InitVal = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">  LoopVal = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 1, e = Phi.getNumOperands(); i != e; i += 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Phi.getOperand(i + 1).getMBB() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">      InitVal = Phi.getOperand(i).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remember the registers that are used in different stages. The index is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This map is updated during Phis generation to point to the most recent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ModuloScheduleExpander::generateEpilog(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to change the branch from the kernel to the first epilog block, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Generate Phis for the specific block in the generated pipelined code.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function looks at the Phis from the original code to guide the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="comment">/// creation of new Phis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ModuloScheduleExpander::generateExistingPhis(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB2,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;KernelBB, ValueMapTy &#42;VRMap, InstrMapTy &amp;InstrMap,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastStageNum, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurStageNum, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsLast) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the stage number for the initial value of the Phi, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// comes from the prolog. The prolog to use depends on to which kernel/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// epilog that we&#39;re adding the Phi.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrologStage = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrevStage = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InKernel = (LastStageNum == CurStageNum);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrevStage = CurStageNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - (CurStageNum - LastStageNum);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrevStage = LastStageNum + (CurStageNum - LastStageNum) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> BBI = BB-&gt;instr&#95;begin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   BBE = BB-&gt;getFirstNonPHI();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">       BBI != BBE; ++BBI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a> = BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InitVal = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopVal = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#ad4cf8c8e4e2cc5bf94656e979ed629b4">getPhiRegs</a>(&#42;BBI, BB, InitVal, LoopVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhiOp1 = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Phi value from the loop body typically is defined in the loop, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not always. So, we need to check if the value is defined in the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhiOp2 = LoopVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = VRMap&#91;LastStageNum&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(LoopVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">        It != VRMap&#91;LastStageNum&#93;.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">      PhiOp2 = It-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageScheduled = Schedule.getStage(&amp;&#42;BBI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopValStage = Schedule.getStage(MRI.getVRegDef(LoopVal));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumStages = getStagesForReg(Def, CurStageNum);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumStages == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t need to generate a Phi anymore, but we need to rename any uses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the Phi value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewReg = VRMap&#91;PrevStage&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">      rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, 0, &amp;&#42;BBI, Def,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">                            InitVal, NewReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">        VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust the number of Phis needed depending on the number of prologs left,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and the distance from where the Phi is first scheduled. The number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phis cannot exceed the number of prolog stages. Each stage can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// potentially define two values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxPhis = PrologStage + 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)PrologStage &lt;= LoopValStage)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">      MaxPhis = std::max((</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)MaxPhis - (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)LoopValStage, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumPhis = std::min(NumStages, MaxPhis);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AccessStage = (LoopValStage != -1) ? LoopValStage : StageScheduled;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the epilog, we may need to look back one stage to get the correct</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phi name, because the epilog and prolog blocks execute the same stage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The correct name is from the previous block only when the Phi has</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// been completely scheduled prior to the epilog, and Phi value is not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// needed in multiple stages.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageDiff = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; StageScheduled &gt;= LoopValStage &amp;&amp; AccessStage == 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">        NumPhis == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">      StageDiff = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust the computations below when the phi and the loop definition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are scheduled in different stages.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel &amp;&amp; LoopValStage != -1 &amp;&amp; StageScheduled &gt; LoopValStage)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">      StageDiff = StageScheduled - LoopValStage;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> np = 0; np &lt; NumPhis; ++np) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the Phi hasn&#39;t been scheduled, then use the initial Phi operand</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value. Otherwise, use the scheduled version of the instruction. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is a little complicated when a Phi references another Phi.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (np &gt; PrologStage || StageScheduled &gt;= (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)LastStageNum)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">        PhiOp1 = InitVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the Phi has already been scheduled in a prolog stage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PrologStage &gt;= AccessStage + StageDiff + np &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">               VRMap&#91;PrologStage - StageDiff - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal) != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">        PhiOp1 = VRMap&#91;PrologStage - StageDiff - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the Phi has already been scheduled, but the loop instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is either another Phi, or doesn&#39;t occur in the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PrologStage &gt;= AccessStage + StageDiff + np) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the Phi references another Phi, we need to examine the other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phi to get the correct value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">        PhiOp1 = LoopVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">        MachineInstr &#42;InstOp1 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Indirects = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InstOp1 &amp;&amp; InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>() &amp;&amp; InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>() == BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhiStage = Schedule.getStage(InstOp1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)(PrologStage - StageDiff - np) &lt; PhiStage + Indirects)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">            PhiOp1 = <a href="#ac9dc42645b503479257f220db42a4c00">getInitPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp1, BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">            PhiOp1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#a8c6faeaacd5c214d9ebeeecfe5900706">getLoopPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp1, BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">          InstOp1 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhiOpStage = Schedule.getStage(InstOp1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageAdj = (PhiOpStage != -1 ? PhiStage - PhiOpStage : 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PhiOpStage != -1 &amp;&amp; PrologStage - StageAdj &gt;= Indirects + np) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> = VRMap&#91;PrologStage - StageAdj - Indirects - np&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>.find(PhiOp1); It != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">              PhiOp1 = It-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">          ++Indirects;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">        PhiOp1 = InitVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this references a generated Phi in the kernel, get the Phi operand</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the incoming block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MachineInstr &#42;InstOp1 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>() &amp;&amp; InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>() == KernelBB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp1 = <a href="#ac9dc42645b503479257f220db42a4c00">getInitPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp1, KernelBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">      MachineInstr &#42;PhiInst = MRI.getVRegDef(LoopVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopDefIsPhi = PhiInst &amp;&amp; PhiInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the epilog, a map lookup is needed to get the value from the kernel,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or previous epilog block. How is does this depends on if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction is scheduled in the previous block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InKernel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageDiffAdj = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoopValStage != -1 &amp;&amp; StageScheduled &gt; LoopValStage)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">          StageDiffAdj = StageScheduled - LoopValStage;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the loop value defined in the kernel, unless the kernel</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contains the last definition of the Phi.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (np == 0 &amp;&amp; PrevStage == LastStageNum &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">            (StageScheduled != 0 || LoopValStage != 0) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">            VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the value defined by the Phi. We add one because we switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from looking at the loop value to the Phi definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (np &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; PrevStage == LastStageNum &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">                 VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np + 1&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Def))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np + 1&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the loop value defined in the kernel.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(LoopValStage) &gt; PrologStage + 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">                 VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the value defined by the Phi, unless we&#39;re generating the first</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// epilog and the Phi refers to a Phi in a different stage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Def) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">                 (!LoopDefIsPhi || (PrevStage != LastStageNum) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">                  (LoopValStage == StageScheduled)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we can reuse an existing Phi. This occurs when a Phi</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// references another Phi, and the other Phi is scheduled in an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// earlier stage. We can try to reuse an existing Phi up until the last</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stage of the current Phi.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoopDefIsPhi) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(PrologStage - np) &gt;= StageScheduled) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LVNumStages = getStagesForPhi(LoopVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageDiff = (StageScheduled - LoopValStage);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">          LVNumStages -= StageDiff;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure the loop value Phi has been processed already.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LVNumStages &gt; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)np &amp;&amp; VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">            NewReg = PhiOp2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ReuseStage = CurStageNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isLoopCarried(&#42;PhiInst))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">              ReuseStage -= LVNumStages;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the Phi to reuse has been generated yet. If not, then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is nothing to reuse.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VRMap&#91;ReuseStage - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">              NewReg = VRMap&#91;ReuseStage - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">              rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    Def, NewReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the map with the new Phi name.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">              VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = NewReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">              PhiOp2 = NewReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VRMap&#91;LastStageNum - np - 1&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">                PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;LastStageNum - np - 1&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsLast &amp;&amp; np == NumPhis - 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, NewReg, BB, MRI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel &amp;&amp; StageDiff &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">            VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - StageDiff - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - StageDiff - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI.getRegClass(Def);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewReg = MRI.createVirtualRegister(RC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">      MachineInstrBuilder NewPhi =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;NewBB, NewBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa7dc7faaab4856b8f0014b8283e26c7b">getFirstNonPHI</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">                  TII-&gt;get(TargetOpcode::PHI), NewReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">      LIS.InsertMachineInstrInMaps(&#42;NewPhi);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (np == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">        InstrMap&#91;NewPhi&#93; = &amp;&#42;BBI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We define the Phis after creating the new pipelined code, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we need to rename the Phi values in scheduled instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrevReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel &amp;&amp; VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">        PrevReg = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">      rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, Def,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">                            NewReg, PrevReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the Phi has been scheduled, use the new name for rewriting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Def)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">        rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, R,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">                              NewReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we need to rename any uses that occurs after the loop. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register to replace depends on whether the Phi is scheduled in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// epilog.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsLast &amp;&amp; np == NumPhis - 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, NewReg, BB, MRI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the kernel, a dependent Phi uses the value from this Phi.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">        PhiOp2 = NewReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the map with the new Phi name.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">      VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = NewReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumPhis++ &lt; NumStages) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">      rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, NumPhis, &amp;&#42;BBI, Def,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">                            NewReg, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we need to rename a Phi that has been eliminated due to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scheduling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumStages == 0 &amp;&amp; IsLast) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;CurStageMap = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = CurStageMap.find(LoopVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It != CurStageMap.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, It-&gt;second, BB, MRI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Generate Phis for the specified block in the generated pipelined code.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="comment">/// These are new Phis needed because the definition is scheduled after the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="comment">/// use in the pipelined sequence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ModuloScheduleExpander::generatePhis(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB2,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;KernelBB, ValueMapTy &#42;VRMap, ValueMapTy &#42;VRMapPhi,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">    InstrMapTy &amp;InstrMap, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastStageNum, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurStageNum,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsLast) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the stage number that contains the initial Phi value, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the Phi from the previous stage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrologStage = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrevStage = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageDiff = CurStageNum - LastStageNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InKernel = (StageDiff == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrevStage = CurStageNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - StageDiff;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">    PrevStage = LastStageNum + StageDiff - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> BBI = BB-&gt;getFirstNonPHI(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   BBE = BB-&gt;instr&#95;end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">       BBI != BBE; ++BBI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = BBI-&gt;getNumOperands(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">      MachineOperand &amp;MO = BBI-&gt;getOperand(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StageScheduled = Schedule.getStage(&amp;&#42;BBI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StageScheduled != -1 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting scheduled instruction.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a> = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumPhis = getStagesForReg(Def, CurStageNum);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An instruction scheduled in stage 0 and is used after the loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// requires a phi in the epilog for the last definition from either</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the kernel or prolog.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; NumPhis == 0 &amp;&amp; StageScheduled == 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="#ac798656b15d5b309da9e0cf04880d2d6">hasUseAfterLoop</a>(Def, BB, MRI))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">        NumPhis = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)StageScheduled &gt; PrologStage)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhiOp2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">        PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MachineInstr &#42;InstOp2 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp2))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InstOp2-&gt;isPHI() &amp;&amp; InstOp2-&gt;getParent() == NewBB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">            PhiOp2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#a8c6faeaacd5c214d9ebeeecfe5900706">getLoopPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp2, BB2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of Phis can&#39;t exceed the number of prolog stages. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// prolog stage number is zero based.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumPhis &gt; PrologStage + 1 - StageScheduled)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">        NumPhis = PrologStage + 1 - StageScheduled;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> np = 0; np &lt; NumPhis; ++np) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Org:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Org = ... (Scheduled at Stage#0, NumPhi = 2)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Prolog0 (Stage0):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Clone0 = ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Prolog1 (Stage1):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Clone1 = ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Kernel (Stage2):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Phi0 = Phi %Clone1, Prolog1, %Clone2, Kernel</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Phi1 = Phi %Clone0, Prolog1, %Phi0, Kernel</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Clone2 = ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Epilog0 (Stage3):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Phi2 = Phi %Clone1, Prolog1, %Clone2, Kernel</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Phi3 = Phi %Clone0, Prolog1, %Phi0, Kernel</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Epilog1 (Stage4):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %Phi4 = Phi %Clone0, Prolog0, %Phi2, Epilog0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VRMap = &#123;0: %Clone0, 1: %Clone1, 2: %Clone2&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VRMapPhi (after Kernel) = &#123;0: %Phi1, 1: %Phi0&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VRMapPhi (after Epilog0) = &#123;0: %Phi3, 1: %Phi2&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhiOp1 = VRMap&#91;PrologStage&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (np &lt;= PrologStage)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp1 = VRMap&#91;PrologStage - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InKernel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PrevStage == LastStageNum &amp;&amp; np == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">            PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;LastStageNum&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">            PhiOp2 = VRMapPhi&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI.getRegClass(Def);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> NewReg = MRI.createVirtualRegister(RC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">        MachineInstrBuilder NewPhi =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;NewBB, NewBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa7dc7faaab4856b8f0014b8283e26c7b">getFirstNonPHI</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">                    TII-&gt;get(TargetOpcode::PHI), NewReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">        NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">        NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">        LIS.InsertMachineInstrInMaps(&#42;NewPhi);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (np == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">          InstrMap&#91;NewPhi&#93; = &amp;&#42;BBI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rewrite uses and update the map. The actions depend upon whether</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we generating code for the kernel or epilog blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InKernel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">          rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, PhiOp1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">                                NewReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">          rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, PhiOp2,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">                                NewReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">          PhiOp2 = NewReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">          VRMapPhi&#91;PrevStage - np - 1&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = NewReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (np == NumPhis - 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, NewReg, BB, MRI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
